name: Roslyn Code Club
desc: Replaced the outdated club website with a completely refreshed one, using a modern tech stack from scratch. Implemented OAuth and a workshop system for easier access/organization.

name: discussmed
desc: discussmed strives to serve as the intermediate between youth and medical advocacy organizations.

name: UBG100
desc: UBG100 is a website serving as an online aggregator for some of the most popular and beloved games on the internet with over 20 million visits to date, all completely for free. Mobile responsiveness is in progress.

name: Parallax
desc: A website for Parallax, a verified Discord bot with utility and entertainment that served over 300,000 users. Parallax is currently being rewritten and improved.

name: Artist Portfolio
desc: A fully responsive website for a musician and my first time using the React library.

name: Stickers
desc: A dynamic social media component I created as part of my internship project for the company Saturn.

name: Club Platform
desc: My unique interpretation of a club platform that I created in two days. It's a fully responsive, single page application.
